suppress.notes: CVE-2018-1258: we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258
Caused by not using latest version of HMCTS service-auth-provider-client. Once we move to >3.0.0 these should be removed
only affects log appender over SMTP, seriously who does this...
XSS issue, not relevant in performance tests
suppress.vulnerabilityName: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
